titleStmt.title: A full reply to certaine briefe observations and anti-queries on Master Prynnes twelve questions about church-government: vvherein the frivolousnesse, falsenesse, and grosse mistakes of this anonymous answerer (ashamed of his name) and his weak grounds for independency, and separation, are modestly discovered, refelled. / By William Prynne of Lincolnes Inne, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.L. for Michael Sparke Senior, and are to be sold at the Blew-Bible in Green-Arbour.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
